Sarah Katherine Calburn, nke a na-akpọkarị Sarah Calburn, (onye amụrụ n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Mee 1964, Johannesburg ) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ma n'ewu ụlọ.
A mụrụ Sarah Calburn na Johannesburg ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Roedean, ma mee mmemme nnabata ndị ọhụrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1981
Ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ma ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1987, n'afọ 1996 e nyere ya nzere masta maka nyocha ya na Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology nke Australia
N'otu afọ ahụ, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ na Johannesburg.
Calburn arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka onye na-ewu ụlọ na Paris, Hong Kong, Sydney na Melbourne
Na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ ọrụ ụlọ, ọ haziri ụlọ ngosi nka Momo nke Johannesburg
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na kọmitii nke Gauteng Institute for Architecture ma bụrụ onye nduzi mmemme nke ArchitectureZA nke afọ 2010,  South African Architectural Biennale nke mbụ
nke ebumnuche ya bụ mmepe obodo mepere emepe na Johannesburg
Calburn akụziekwala na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Mahadum nke Cape Town na RMIT Melbourne.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, ya na onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ Dustin A
Tusnovics, Sarah Calburn ritere ihe nrite nke atọ na Urbaninform Design Contest na Zurich, Switzerland, maka ọrụ ha Taking the Gap
Ndị ọka ikpe kwuru banyere atụmatụ ya siri pụrụ iche, na-ewere ya dị ka atụmatụ dị oke mkpa maka ụlọ ọha na eze na South Africa.
